Storm Kaefer
Hey! I'm a recent Computing Science graduate from the University of Alberta. Check out some of the projects I've been a part of!

Portfolio - Work In Progress

About Me

I enjoy helping users create solutions that deliver their needs, in a simple way.

When I'm not having fun experimenting with web technologies, I'm playing drums in bands, creating music, going on hikes, and enjoying life. Also probably fixing my grandmother's printer, that happens from time to time.
